derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin referent- 'bringing back', from the verb referre (see refer)

means.word_mean: 1. something referred to; the object of a reference
2. the first term in a proposition; the term to which other terms relate
3. something that refers; a term that refers to another term
